name: admin.workflows.collaborators.add
desc: Add collaborators to workflows within the team or enterprise

collaborator_ids.desc: Array of collaborators (encoded user IDs) to add; max 50.

workflow_ids.desc: Array of workflow IDs to edit; max 50.

errors.not_allowed: The user is not allowed to access this API method
errors.error_adding_collaborators: There were one or more errors adding workflow collaborators
